Password Generation GUI¶

UI Components¶

Interface Elements¶

Widget

Type

Purpose

Terminal

QTextEdit

Displays generation output

Name Field

QLineEdit

Target username

Birthdate

QLineEdit

Birth year (YYYY)

Hobbies

QLineEdit

Interests/activities

Favorite

QLineEdit

Favorite items

Generate

QPushButton

Initiate process

Workflow¶

        sequenceDiagram
    User->>+GUI: Enters profile data
    GUI->>+Core: Passes parameters
    Core->>+AI: Generates passwords
    AI-->>-Core: Returns results
    Core-->>-GUI: Passes back
    GUI->>+Filesystem: Saves output
    GUI-->>-User: Shows completion

Styling¶

Color Scheme:

Element

Hex Code

Usage

Background

#121212

Main window

Text

#00ff00

Primary text

Accent

#005500

Borders

Console

#0a0a0a

Terminal BG

Example Usage¶

from GUI.ui.generation_window import GenerationWindow
from PyQt5.QtWidgets import QApplication

app = QApplication([])
window = GenerationWindow()
window.exec_()
